title.@value: Withdrawal due to unknown or unspecified psychoactive substance, with seizures

definition.@value: All diagnostic requirements for Withdrawal due to unknown or unspecified psychoactive substance are met and the withdrawal state is accompanied by seizures (i.e., generalised tonic-clonic seizures) but not by perceptual disturbances.

label.@value: Withdrawal due to unknown or unspecified psychoactive substance, with seizures
